articles.description: The Fab Four’s 1963 hit is an explosion of exuberance that made “yeah yeah yeah” the fanfare for a culture on the brink of irreversible change
articles.content: To hear She Loves You bursting out of a radio in the last week of August 1963 was to recognise a shout of triumph. Everything the Beatles had promised through the first half of the year found its foc… [+4569 chars]

articles.content:
The will of Carole Baskins late husband, whose death is explored in the Netflix series Tiger King, has been proven to be forged, a Florida Sheriff confirmed.
